content.question: According to the chemiosmotic model proposed by Peter Mitchell in 1961, an electrochemical gradient is linked to the synthesis of ATP in mitochondria. Construct an explanation of the chemiosmotic model by doing each of the following. (a) Make a claim about the role of the inner mitochondrial membrane in ATP synthesis.

frqParts.text: According to the chemiosmotic model proposed by Peter Mitchell in 1961, an electrochemical gradient is linked to the synthesis of ATP in mitochondria. Construct an explanation of the chemiosmotic model by doing each of the following. (a) Make a claim about the role of the inner mitochondrial membrane in ATP synthesis.
(b) Present ONE piece of evidence that supports the role you proposed in part (a).
(c) Provide reasoning to explain how the evidence you presented in part (b) supports the claim you made in part (a).
